channel.title: ::commands
channel.description: i need help with making ::commands i just dont awnt sendframe i want the hole command cuz idk wht to rite on top

item.title: ::commands
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:4, topic:286298”][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=378637.msg2847902#msg2847902 date=1246384180]

First off, correct your grammar, second off no one is going to spoon feed you so I suggest you learn Java and make the code yourself.
Or take it off another source.

Like he said…But I’ll give you an idea…

if (command.startsWith("commands") { commands(); }

Then just make a commands void and add the interface and sendQuests to it.
[/quote]

Or…

if (command.startsWith("commands") { sendMessage2("The commands are of the following:", "::spawn 1 1, and ::noob."); }[/quote]

Could do that, but I think an interface would be cleaner.

Read full topic
